Content:: Guy Niv (born 8 March 1994 in Misgav) is an Israeli cyclist, who currently rides for UCI WorldTeam Israel–Premier Tech.[3] In 2019, he completed the Giro d'Italia, finishing in 113th place.[4] In August 2020, he became the first Israeli national to race in the Tour de France.[5][6] This biographical article relating to Israeli cycling is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
